title: UX/UI Design MyMu
excerpt: An intuitive digital fortune-telling platform designed through UX/UI to provide accessible guidance and comfort. It features diverse readings, robust astrologer search/review, and seamless appointments/payments, alongside tools for astrologers to display expertise, manage schedules, and boost visibility for a trusted, personalized experience.

techStack.title: Figma
techStack.info: A cloud-based design and prototyping tool. It's widely used by UI/UX designers, product managers, and developers for creating, collaborating on, and testing digital product designs (like websites and mobile apps).

techStack.title: Maze
techStack.info: a user testing and research platform. It helps teams validate their designs and gather actionable insights by observing how real users interact with prototypes or live products.

challenge: the challenge was to redefine digital fortune-telling by solving key user frustrations like irrelevant advice, poor UX/UI, and unclear pricing, while also addressing privacy concerns and the need for reassurance and entertainment for a new generation. My central role as wireframe and prototype designer involved crafting an exceptionally engaging and intuitive UX/UI within a limited timeframe for this complex vision.
solution: an intuitive digital fortune-telling application prototype, crafted through comprehensive UX/UI research. Designed to provide accessible guidance and comfort, it directly resolves issues like irrelevant advice and unclear pricing. MyMu offers diverse reading types, robust astrologer search/review, and seamless appointment/payment integration. The platform also empowers astrologers with tools for verified expertise display, flexible scheduling, and enhanced visibility, all within a private, engaging, and user-friendly experience for all users.
